entry.title: $2499 // Stunning newly reno2BR PRIME Prospect Heights steps from P.Park trains
entry.content:
===\\\**^**^**^**NO FEE!!!**^**^**^**///===
Brand new renovations in this Classic Prewar building on beautiful treelined block in Prospect Heights. Step inside to find sun splashed rooms with high ceilings and glossy hardwood floors. The kitchen has brand new appliances, including a dishwasher and lots of storage cabinets. Queen sized bedrooms will easily fit all your belongings and there's a modern, tastefully tiled bathroom. There's a laundry room in the building. AMAZiNG location!!! Just 3 blocks from Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Museum. You'll find popular spots like Chavela's and Catfish a short stroll from your door and the 2, 3, 4 & 5 trains just 5-10 minutes away for an easy commute.

There's No Fee and just First and Security moves you in! Schedule your appointment to view today!

Call or text (no emails please) ==>>==>>//9:1:7|||7:9:2|||1:4:0:2\\<<==<<==
